attributes.action: require all children between the ages of 6 to 16 participate in at least 2 hours of organized physical, social, service or similar activity per week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children should take part in some sort of extra curricular activity, outside of school teaching per week, organized by a formal organization such as, Schools, Youth Groups, Cadets, Scouts, Football Club etc. Keeping bored children behaved from an early age rather than out on the streets misbehaving.
